Creation.Stat Restrictions: Your Intelligence and Might must be at least 1.

Training: If your Intelligence is at least 0, choose a Weapon category (1-Handed Melee, 2-Handed Ranged, Shields, etc) and get Training in it.
Language: If your Intelligence is at least 1, you can speak 1 Draconic, the ancient language of dragons.
Other: Dragonborn have tails. Cause it's cool to have a tail.

~Draconic Ancestry~.Effect:
When creating your character, choose your Dragonborn type:
Black	- Acid
Blue - Cold
Brass	- Fire
Bronze - Thunder
Gold - Fire
Red - Fire
Silver - Force
Gray - Necrotic
White	- Cold
Green	- Poison
That becomes your Dragonborn Element.

~Dragonborn Resistance~.Effect: You take only 50% Damage from your Dragonborn Element type.

~Dragon's Breath~.Effect:
Breathe your Dragonborn Element in a 3x1 meter line.
Make an attack against all Units caught in your breath.
The attack deals 2d6 + your class's Main Stat damage of your Dragonborn Element (against their Defense).

Starting Abilities Description.Color and Element:
When you create your character, choose your Dragonborn's color/element combination.
Then, you will choose the shape you want to be able to breathe your element in.

Starting Abilities Description.Area Shapes:
If you are playing on a grid, check the Area Shapes section to see how the Cone will look.
Breath - Line can be centered with either the left or right or diagonal starting square directly in front of you (so it might be slightly to the left or slightly to the right).

~Breath - Cone~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes in a 3 meter, 90* cone.

~Breath - Line~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes in a 4x2 meter line.

~Breath - Blast~.Effect: Your Dragon's Breath now breathes on all creatures within 2 meters of you instead of a line.
